title: Will the rate of CPI inflation be above 2.2% for the year ending in July 2023?
subtitle: 2.3% or above
rules_primary: If the Consumer Price Index (CPI) increases by more than 2.2% in the twelve months ending July 2023 (as represented by the one-decimal place value reported by the Bureau of Labor Statistics), then the market resolves to Yes.
rules_secondary: The market will close at 8:25 AM ET on the date of the expected release of the data.
